• Nvidia Corporation (NVDA) is a leading artificial intelligence (AI) chipmaker, with its products used in drones, weapons, and AI models.
• It has recently been subject to US export restrictions, and has seen its stock drop sharply.
• It has received investments from Intel, AMD, Google, and Microsoft, and is working with Oracle Cloud Infrastructure and Nvidia's DGX Cloud.
• It is also looking to carry out a stock split in the near future.
